DOC.brief_summary: The treatment option nail psoriasis limit , management nail psoriasis challenge physicians.To evaluate effect pulse dye laser ( PDL ) treatment nail psoriasis .
DOC.detailed_description: Psoriatic nail patient 's right hand treat use PDL ( 595 nm ) .The pulse duration 1.5ms , beam diameter 7mm , laser energy 8.0 10.0 J/cm2 . The treatment course pulse dye laser monthly 6 month . Psoriatic nails hand treat Tazarotene cream 6 month . Clinical efficacy statistically evaluate accord Nail Psoriasis Severity Index ( NAPSI ) score difference right leave hand one month 3rd 6th therapy .
